title: A New Chapter: Welcoming 2024 with Open Arms
author: Sandeep Koirala
intro: As I approach the end of my studies this February, I can't help but feel a mix of excitement and contemplation. The journey from Finland to the US, spanning more than a decade, has been one of constant learning and adapting. With the completion of my course, I look forward to dedicating more time to myself and my loved ones. Good days are indeed on the horizon, and I have big plans for 2024. Let's see how things unfold.

sections.title: Reflecting on a Decade in Finland

contents.description: Having lived in Finland for over ten years, my life underwent many transformations. The experiences I gathered there have been invaluable, yet the move to the US brought about a sense of continuity with subtle changes. The transition has been intriguing, and I'm still exploring whether it has led to the happiness I seek.

sections.title: Embracing the End of an Era

contents.description: The completion of my studies is not just an academic milestone; it's the beginning of a new phase of life. It promises more time for personal endeavors, reconnecting with loved ones, and pursuing passions that were sidelined by academic commitments.

The year 2024 is not just another year in the calendar; it's a canvas of opportunities. I have plans to further my professional skills, explore new hobbies, and maybe venture into areas unexplored. While the exact path is uncertain, the journey itself is thrilling.

sections.title: The Role of Time and Change

contents.description: In life's journey, change is the only constant. While I'm eager to see what 2024 holds, I'm also prepared to embrace the unexpected. After all, it's these surprises that often lead to the most memorable experiences.
